AI Description: re2c is a tool for writing fast and flexible lexer/scanner programs. It translates regular expressions into deterministic finite automata (DFA) and compiles them into C/C++ code. This allows for efficient lexical analysis of input streams.
Core Features: Efficient Generation Of Lexer/Scanner Programs, Translation Of Regular Expressions Into Dfa, Compilation Into C/C++ Code, Support For Various Lexing/Scanning Tasks
